item.title: Paella in NYC
item.description: These days, I'm starting to cook by myself (aka learning) and yesterday I made paella for 6 people while staying in NYC (leaving on Sunday...). This is the third time in two weeks that I cook this Spanish dish, but I think the results were pretty good despite the lack of ingredients. After all, cooking is not as hard as I originally thought! And it's pretty fun too! Just blogging this because the results look nice:
